GE Digital | Schenectady, NY | On-site | Full-time | Software Engineer

This role is on a team called the Software Engineering Competency Center. The team is part of the core IT group within GE Digital. We deliver IT solutions from infrastructure to services to applications for businesses across the GE portfolio.

The successful candidate will develop projects running on AWS as well as other cloud platforms. We mainly develop in Node.js and Go, though we definitely dabble in other languages as needed.

We architect for high scalability and reliability using serverless and container-based platforms and distributed service patterns.

Apply here if you are interested: https://jobs.gecareers.com/ShowJob/Id/54423/Staff-Software-E...

Thanks!
